name: Blasterverse
description:
First debuted at Tokyo Game Show 2022, the Blasterverse serves as a demonstration for our ground breaking controller for VR and more...the Mavrik Pro. Try out 3 of our custom blaster assets and the haptic feedback provided by the Mavrik Pro.

This demo is currently available for PCVR only and is meant to be used with our proprietary StrikerLink software and a Vive Wrist Tracker.

Please see our other demos if you need MetaQuest 2, Pico Neo, or Vive Wave compatibility.
